question: Given a large dataset of audio recordings, describe at least three feature-extraction techniques (e.g., Mel-spectrogram, log-Mel, MFCC) and discuss the pros and cons of each for a SER task.
transcript: There are many additional extraction techniques. The most popular ones are pre-techniques which are male spectrogram, log-mell and MFCC. For example, I have used MFCC in my gradation project. It was from two extract features, very little features. Then feed it to the network like CNN, LSTM, Olvail, LSTM and all of these. The other ones are male spectrogram and log-mell. They can be used also. Each one of them has a Southern Conte and trending grad application. You want to do your tools and the app...
